thread.title: "He's a broken human being": Cruz's attorney

title: "He's a broken human being": Cruz's attorney
text:
"He's a broken human being": Cruz's attorney 4:50am IST - 00:48 
The court-appointed lawyer for the accused Florida shooter says the suspect has expressed remorse for his crimes. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
